00031 
00032 Entree& champ_init_canal_sinal::readOn(Entree& is)
00033 {
00034 // Initialisation par defaut des minimums et maximums
00035 // pour generaliser l'initialisation du canal pour
00036 // n'importe quelle position dans l'espace.
00037   min_dir_flow=0.;
00038   min_dir_wall=0.;
00039   dir_flow=0;
00040   dir_wall=1;
00041 
00042 // Lecture de la dimension
00043   int dim;
00044   dim=lire_dimension(is,que_suis_je());
00045   dimensionner(1,dim);
00046   if (abs(dim)>3)
00047     {
00048       Cerr << "Problem while reading the dimension of field champ_init_canal_sinal" << finl;
00049       Cerr << "Check that it was correctly indicated : dim = " << dim << finl;
00050       exit();
00051     }
00052 // FIN Lecture de la dimension
00053   ArrOfInt Verif(9);
00054   Verif[3]=1;
00055   Verif[5]=1;
00056   Verif[6]=1;
00057   Verif[7]=1;
00058   Verif[8]=1;
00059   Motcles les_mots(9);
00060   Motcle mot_lu;
00061   {
00062     les_mots[0]="Ucent";
00063     les_mots[1]="h";
00064     les_mots[2]="ampli_bruit";
00065     les_mots[3]="ampli_sin";
00066     les_mots[4]="omega";
00067     les_mots[5]="dir_flow";
00068     les_mots[6]="dir_wall";
00069     les_mots[7]="min_dir_flow";
00070     les_mots[8]="min_dir_wall";
00071   }
00072   Motcle acc_ouverte("{");
00073   Motcle acc_fermee("}");
00074   is >> mot_lu;
00075   if(mot_lu != acc_ouverte)
00076     {
00077       Cerr << "Expecting a { instead of " << mot_lu
00078            << "while reading intial condition" << finl;
00079     }
00080   is >> mot_lu;
00081   while(mot_lu != acc_fermee)
00082     {
00083       int rang=les_mots.search(mot_lu);
00084       switch(rang)
00085         {
00086         case 0 :
00087           is >> Ucent;
00088           Cerr << "Centerline Longitudinal Velocity = " << Ucent << finl;
00089 // valeur par defaut de ampli_sin = Ucent/10.
00090           ampli_sin = Ucent/10.;
00091           Verif[0] = 1;
00092           break;
00093         case 1  :
00094           is >> h;
00095           Cerr << "Channel Half-height = " << h << finl;
00096           Verif[1] = 1;
00097           break;
00098         case 2  :
00099           is >> ampli_bruit;
00100           Cerr << "Noise Amplitude = " << ampli_bruit << finl;
00101           Verif[2] = 1;
00102           break;
00103         case 3  :
00104           is >> ampli_sin;
00105           Cerr << "Sine Perturbation Amplitude = " << ampli_sin << finl;
00106           Verif[3] = 1;
00107           break;
00108         case 4  :
00109           is >> omega;
00110           Cerr << "Omega = " << omega  << finl;
00111           Verif[4] = 1;
00112           break;
00113         case 5  :
00114           is >> dir_flow;
00115           Cerr << "Flow direction : " << dir_flow << finl;
00116           Verif[5] = 1;
00117           break;
00118         case 6  :
00119           is >> dir_wall;
00120           Cerr << "The specified Wall direction : " << dir_wall  << finl;
00121           Verif[6] = 1;
00122           break;
00123         case 7  :
00124           is >> min_dir_flow;
00125           Cerr << "Minimum value position in flow direction : " << min_dir_flow  << finl;
00126           Verif[7] = 1;
00127           break;
00128         case 8  :
00129           is >> min_dir_wall;
00130           Cerr << "Minimum value position in wall direction : " << min_dir_wall  << finl;
00131           Verif[8] = 1;
00132           break;
00133         default :
00134           {
00135             Cerr << "Error in champ_init_canal_sinal::readOn " << finl;
00136             Cerr << mot_lu << " is not understood by velocity initial condition generation." << finl;
00137             Cerr << "The understood keywords are : " << les_mots << finl;
00138             exit();
00139           }
00140         }
00141       is >> mot_lu;
00142     }
00143 
00144   if(dir_flow==dir_wall)
00145     {
00146       Cerr << "Error in champ_init_canal_sinal::readOn " << finl;
00147       Cerr << "You gave the same direction for a wall" << finl;
00148       Cerr << "and the flow direction : Impossible !" << finl;
00149       exit();
00150     }
00151 
00152   if((dir_wall>2)||(dir_flow>2))
00153     {
00154       Cerr << "Error in champ_init_canal_sinal::readOn " << finl;
00155       Cerr << "One of the specified directions are not possible." << finl;
00156       Cerr << "Use : 0 for X, 1 for Y and 2 for Z !" << finl;
00157       exit();
00158     }
00159 
00160   int valmin = min_array(Verif);
00161   int i;
00162   if (valmin == 0)
00163     {
00164       for (i=0; i<5; i++)
00165         {
00166           if (Verif[i]==0)
00167             {
00168               Cerr << "You didn't give a value for " << les_mots[i] << finl;
00169             }
00170         }
00171       Cerr << "Error in champ_init_canal_sinal::readOn " << finl;
00172       Cerr << "User needs to specify values for the parameters below.";
00173       Cerr << "The syntax is : Ucent val_Ucent   h val_h   ampli_bruit val_ampli_bruit [ampli_sin val_ampli_sin] omega val_omega" << finl;
00174       Cerr << "dir_flow val_dir_flow   dir_wall val_dir_wall" << finl;
00175       exit();
00176     }
00177 
00178   return is;
00179 }

00186 {
00187   Champ_base::affecter_erreur();
00188   return *this;

00191 //
00192 //! Renvoie la valeur en un point.
00193 DoubleVect& champ_init_canal_sinal::valeur_a(const DoubleVect& positions,
00194                                              DoubleVect& tab_valeurs) const
00195 {
00196   Cerr<<"values = "<<tab_valeurs<<finl;
00197   Cerr << "In champ_init_canal_sinal::valeur_a nb_compo_=" << nb_compo_ << finl;
00198   tab_valeurs.resize(nb_compo_);
00199   switch(dimension)
00200     {
00201     case(1):
00202       {
00203         assert(nb_compo_==1);
00204         tab_valeurs(dir_flow)= fx(positions(dir_flow));
00205         break;
00206       }
00207     case(2):
00208       {
00209         assert(nb_compo_<=2);
00210         tab_valeurs(dir_flow)= fx(positions(dir_flow), positions(dir_wall));
00211         if(nb_compo_==2)
00212           tab_valeurs(dir_wall)= fy(positions(dir_flow), positions(dir_wall));
00213         break;
00214       }
00215     case(3):
00216       {
00217         assert(nb_compo_<=3);
00218         tab_valeurs(dir_flow)= fx(positions(dir_flow), positions(dir_wall), positions(3-dir_flow-dir_wall));
00219         if(nb_compo_>=2)
00220           tab_valeurs(dir_wall)= fy(positions(dir_flow), positions(dir_wall), positions(3-dir_flow-dir_wall));
00221         if(nb_compo_>=3)
00222           tab_valeurs(3-dir_flow-dir_wall)= fz(positions(dir_flow), positions(dir_wall), positions(3-dir_flow-dir_wall));
00223         break;
00224       }
00225     }
00226   return tab_valeurs;
00227 }
00228 
00229 //
00230 //
00231 DoubleVect& champ_init_canal_sinal::valeur_a_elem(const DoubleVect& positions,
00232                                                   DoubleVect& tab_valeurs,
00233                                                   int poly) const
00234 {
00235   return valeur_a(positions, tab_valeurs);
00236 }
00237 
00238 //
00239 //
00240 double champ_init_canal_sinal::valeur_a_elem_compo(const DoubleVect& positions,
00241                                                    int ,int ncomp) const
00242 {
00243   double val=0.;
00244   switch(dimension)
00245     {
00246     case(1):
00247       {
00248         val=fx(positions(dir_flow));
00249       }
00250       break;
00251     case(2):
00252       {
00253         if(ncomp==1+dir_flow)
00254           val=fx(positions(dir_flow),positions(dir_wall));
00255         else
00256           val=fy(positions(dir_flow),positions(dir_wall));
00257       }
00258       break;
00259     case(3):
00260       {
00261         if(ncomp==1+dir_flow)
00262           val=fx(positions(dir_flow),positions(dir_wall),positions(3-dir_flow-dir_wall));
00263         else if(ncomp==1+dir_wall)
00264           val=fy(positions(dir_flow),positions(dir_wall),positions(3-dir_flow-dir_wall));
00265         else
00266           val=fz(positions(dir_flow),positions(dir_wall),positions(3-dir_flow-dir_wall));
00267       }
00268       break;
00269     default:
00270       val=-1;
00271       assert(0);
00272       exit();
00273       break;
00274     }
00275   return val;
00276 }
00277 
00278 //
00279 //
00280 DoubleTab& champ_init_canal_sinal::valeur_aux(const DoubleTab& positions,
00281                                               DoubleTab& tab_valeurs) const
00282 {
00283   assert(tab_valeurs.size_totale() == dimension*positions.dimension(0));
00284   int i;
00285   switch(dimension)
00286     {
00287     case(1):
00288       {
00289         assert(nb_compo_==1);
00290         for(i=0; i<tab_valeurs.dimension(0); i++)
00291           {
00292             tab_valeurs(i,dir_flow)= fx(positions(i,dir_flow));
00293           }
00294         break;
00295       }
00296     case(2):
00297       {
00298         assert(nb_compo_<=2);
00299         for(i=0; i<tab_valeurs.dimension(0); i++)
00300           {
00301             tab_valeurs(i,dir_flow)= fx(positions(i,dir_flow), positions(i,dir_wall));
00302             if(nb_compo_==2)
00303               tab_valeurs(i,dir_wall)= fy(positions(i,dir_flow), positions(i,dir_wall));
00304           }
00305         break;
00306       }
00307     case(3):
00308       {
00309         assert(nb_compo_<=3);
00310         for(i=0; i<tab_valeurs.dimension(0); i++)
00311           {
00312             tab_valeurs(i,dir_flow)= fx(positions(i,dir_flow), positions(i,dir_wall), positions(i,3-dir_flow-dir_wall));
00313             if(nb_compo_>=2)
00314               tab_valeurs(i,dir_wall)= fy(positions(i,dir_flow), positions(i,dir_wall), positions(i,3-dir_flow-dir_wall));
00315             if(nb_compo_>=3)
00316               tab_valeurs(i,3-dir_flow-dir_wall)= fz(positions(i,dir_flow), positions(i,dir_wall), positions(i,3-dir_flow-dir_wall));
00317           }
00318         break;
00319       }
00320     }
00321   return tab_valeurs;
00322 }
00323 
00324 //
00325 //
00326 DoubleVect& champ_init_canal_sinal::valeur_aux_compo(const DoubleTab& positions,
00327                                                      DoubleVect& tab_valeurs, int ncomp) const
00328 {
00329   int nb_pos=positions.dimension(0);
00330   tab_valeurs.resize(nb_pos);
00331   assert(ncomp<3);
00332   int i;
00333   switch(dimension)
00334     {
00335     case 1:
00336       {
00337         for(i=0; i<nb_pos; i++)
00338           tab_valeurs(i)= fx(positions(i,dir_flow));
00339         break;
00340       }
00341     case 2:
00342       {
00343         if(ncomp==dir_flow)
00344           for(i=0; i<nb_pos; i++)
00345             tab_valeurs(i)= fx(positions(i,dir_flow), positions(i,dir_wall));
00346         else
00347           for(i=0; i<nb_pos; i++)
00348             tab_valeurs(i)= fy(positions(i,dir_flow), positions(i,dir_wall));
00349         break;
00350       }
00351     case 3:
00352       {
00353         if(ncomp==dir_flow)
00354           for(i=0; i<nb_pos; i++)
00355             tab_valeurs(i)= fx(positions(i,dir_flow), positions(i,dir_wall), positions(i,3-dir_flow-dir_wall));
00356         else if(ncomp==dir_wall)
00357           for(i=0; i<nb_pos; i++)
00358             tab_valeurs(i)= fy(positions(i,dir_flow), positions(i,dir_wall), positions(i,3-dir_flow-dir_wall));
00359         else
00360           for(i=0; i<nb_pos; i++)
00361             tab_valeurs(i)= fz(positions(i,dir_flow), positions(i,dir_wall), positions(i,3-dir_flow-dir_wall));
00362         break;
00363       }
00364     }
00365   return tab_valeurs;
00366 }

00378 //
00379 DoubleVect& champ_init_canal_sinal::valeur_aux_elems_compo(const DoubleTab& positions,
